# pageBreakMargins

**Instance Property**

The spacing between pages as defined by the top, bottom, left, and right margins.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var pageBreakMargins: UIEdgeInsets { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var pageBreakMargins: NSEdgeInsets { get set }
```

## Defining Page Breaks

- **displaysPageBreaks**: A Boolean value indicating whether the view is displaying page breaks.

items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the view is displaying page breaks.
